Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Brunelleschi Hotel places you in the heart of Florence, steps from Duomo Museum and Cathedral of Santa Maria del Fiore. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Giotto's Campanile and Orsanmichele.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 96 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your memory foam bed comes with down comforters. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and designer toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as a fitness center and bicycles to rent. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

A stay at Brunelleschi Hotel places you in the heart of Florence, steps from Duomo Museum and Cathedral of Santa Maria del Fiore. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Giotto's Campanile and Orsanmichele.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Duomo Museum - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Giotto's Campanile - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Orsanmichele - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Dante's House - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Piazza di San Giovanni - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Piazza della Repubblica - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Cathedral of Santa Maria del Fiore - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Bargello Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Battistero di San Giovanni - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Florence Design Academy - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Museo dell'Opera del Duomo - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Badia Fiorentina - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Piazza del Duomo - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Piazza della Signoria - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Loggia del Mercato Nuovo - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi

The preferred airport for Brunelleschi Hotel is Florence (FLR-Peretola) - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Brunelleschi Hotel is Florence (FLR-Peretola) - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. Early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. City tax per person per night is not included, and has to be paid by guest at their departure. Not valid for bookings related to meetings, congresses or incentives. Special Features: - 10% discount at Rinascenti Shopping center in Firenze - Continental breakfast available after 10:30 - Breakfast menu à la Carte ‘ Arab Friendly’ - Prayer Rug e Qibla direction

Room 1
Check in time: 2pmCheck out time: 12pmFREE CANCELLATION! If cancelled or modified up to 2 days before date of arrival, no fee will be charged. If cancelled or modified later or in case of no-show, 100 percent of the first night will be charged.
Notice
The cities of Rome, Florence, Venice and Padova now charge a tourist tax to all visitors staying at hotels, BB’s and apartments. This tax is not included on your room rate, and is payable locally, directly to the hotel and currently ranges from 2 to 5 euros per person per night (subject to change).
